Social And Cultural Activities: Development of Agriculture and Rural Education.
Special Interests: (i) Ground water recharge, water management ;(ii) Rural Industrialisation based on agricultural inputs specially Banana; (iii) Upliftment of rural co-operative societies working for farmers; (iv) Environment and global warming; (v) Non-conventional energy resources and development.
Educational Qualifications: B.Sc. Educated at M.J. College, Jalgaon, Maharashtra
